![KSP-Ribbons-3.png](https://i.ibb.co/RB0tvfs/KSP-Ribbons-3.png)  [See the rest of my Signature!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210823-atomictech/&status=10702&type=status)
I take the hill and demand [@ShuttlePilot](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/209278-shuttlepilot/) to explain.

Hehehe, this is gonna be my hill now! Nothing is gonna defeat the most dangerous fighter jet in the world (F-22)!

![Meet The AIM-260, The Air Force And Navy's Future Long-Range Air-To-Air  Missile](https://www.thedrive.com/content/2019/06/f-22-missile.jpg?quality=85)

Takes bunker hill.

You can’t blow up my bunker on my hill!

F-22 runs out of fuel. (I built one of these in my old game, might craft some proper tail and rudder surfaces now that I know how.)

Bunker gets filled with warm water and tropical fish. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")  Why give up a winning strategy.  ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

Aquarium Hill.

ah yes indestructible shield with no entrances and surrounded by thanoshreks doing a default dance truly unbeatable.

my hill

Too heavy. They sink in the ground, then in the rock, then in the mantle, and finally continue dancing in the liquid iron core on the surface of the inner solid iron core, periodically causing earthquakes.

Iron Core Hill

Molten Lava has spewed up from the holes, covering over the indestructable shield and burying it deep. (sadly the occupants inside suffocate over time.)

**NEW, BIGGER HILL FORMED OVER OLD IRON CORE HILL. I CLAIM MY HILL.**

ah yes indestructible shield with no entrances and surrounded by thanoshreks doing a default dance truly unbeatable. except this time install infinite life support and launch my hill into intergalactic space. I also create a black hole around my hill that shreds away the larger hill created by lava.

to prevent temporal shenanigans I freeze time around said hill  but only the hill not the black hole. also just to make  sure nobody tries anything the hill is surrounded by a pocket dimension nobody can enter. 

my hill

Ejcetion of the Tsar Bomba in progress... No bunker can save you now hehehe

![Tu-95V, a modified Tu-95 dropping the Tsar bomb on 30 October 1961. It was  modified and painted with anti-flash white and had to carry the bomb  semi-externally due to the size of](https://external-preview.redd.it/BirjWuX-2Wzw69A-R_Lt80UZgNW0ZjUeF2w5bT1Uxa4.jpg?auto=webp&s=7eac8ad246095b789b407a324336623fbc614c6f)
I wish you all a goodnight. You are welcome to take my hill.

>

You sit for Eons, long forgotten and boored out of your brain because nothing ever happens where you went. Meanwhile the rest of our universe moves on, cleans up after the Tsar Bomba, builds and squabbles over new hills and gets Ninja'd by [@Admiral Fluffy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210816-admiral-fluffy/)

Our new hills.
New Hills became a town.
The Bill is chill on the hill taking a pill of the dill

The chill gets gone,

Achill<sub>es</sub> Hill

My hill now has a small city on it. Of Tall City.

yay I have captured the original hill 

I construct a time manipulation device and make a ps5 so I can play ksp 2 early I am no longer bored

I create a massive black hole consuming all the hills creating a singularity which I move to the center of the original surrounded by a shielding device preventing the original hill from joining the singularity.

the shielding prevents a massive gravitational well from forming so I am perfectly fine to any of you who would try to turn me into a puddle stuck to the side of my hill.

my hill of all hills

Tank.

My hill.

As apparently magic is a thing( see all the magical things asap1 can do)

I snap my fingers and TahDah.

My hill.
Snapper Hill

ok yes to be fair my hill was quite unfair and magic would have to be real for my hill of all hills to be possible.

I call physics police and you are arrested for theft of a hill and magic.

I then plant flag on hill my hill

The physics is magic.

Alphysical Hill

I give up all the dirt on asap1's capture and imprisonment of hills and so the police go after them instead.

Make a physical iron hill.

**METALPHYSICAL HILL.**

Sends jeb to destroy it 

Makes it a titanium hill

Titania comes and wants her hill back.

Elvish Hill
